amendment.description: To repeal trade adjustment assistance for firms.

vote.text: Amendment SA 645, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 145.

action.text: Amendment SA 645 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 633. (consideration: CR S5816-5817, S5828) To repeal trade adjustment assistance for firms.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 645, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 145.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 645, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 145.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 645 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 633.
